comments.body: This should be a bit more descriptive of what this module specifically does. Most modules build some sort of command or URI, so this doesn't really describe what this module actually does without inferring it from reading the documentation.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +18,22 @@short_description: Manages Out-Of-Band controllers using Redfish APIs
description:
  - Builds Redfish URIs locally and sends them to remote OOB controllers to
    perform an action.
  - Manages OOB controller ex. reboot, log management.

comments.body: Would this failure message (and others) provide a helpful description of the error?
Yes if a manager resource is not found, ```msg="Manager resource not found""```
